text: Emil Nazim oglu Balayev (; born 17 April 1994) is an Azerbaijani footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Qarabağ and the Azerbaijan national football team. He was selected as the footballer of the year in Azerbaijan in 2019. ==Club career== As a youth player Balayev was a member of Neftçi youth system, before he was promoted to the first team in 2011. Balayev made his debut for Neftchi in an Azerbaijan Premier League match against Sumgayit in September 2012.Sumqayit vs. Neftchi 3 - 2 In 2013 Balayev was sent on a season loan to Araz-Naxçıvan.“Neftçi”nin qapıçısı “Araz-Naxçıvan”da Balayev moved from Neftçi to Bundesliga club Eintracht Frankfurt in January 2014.Эмиль Балаев перешел в Айнтрахт However, he failed to make an appearance for the club and was released in June 2016. In January 2019, Balayev moved from Sabail to Kazakhstani club Tobol. He made his professional debut for Tobol in the Kazakhstan Premier League on 9 March 2019, starting in the home match against Irtysh Pavlodar, which finished as a 3–0 win. On 31 January 2020, Balayev left Tobol by mutual consent. On 3 March 2020, Zira announced the signing of Balayev on a contract until the end of the 2019–20 season. On 10 July 2020, Balayev signed a contract with Qarabağ FK. ==International career== Balayev was called up to the Azerbaijan national team for the first time in September 2013 for a 2014 FIFA World Cup qualification match against Israel.Israel vs. Azerbaijan 1 - 1 He made his International debut in a Euro 2020 qualifier against Croatia on 9 September 2019. Balayev was included in the squad of hosts Azerbaijan's under-23 team at the 2017 Islamic Solidarity Games in Baku, in which Azerbaijan went on to win the gold medal.
